## Introduction

This week will introduce tree-based methods.

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this week, you will be able to:

1. Understand the pros and cons of decision trees.
2. Understand the principle of emsemble learning.
3. Understand the principle of random forest and XGBoost.
3. Can apply random forest and XGBoost to supervised learning tasks.
